message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its significance and the benefits it provides, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we propose a fair offer of $14,000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we assure you that the quality and benefits far exceed the cost. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.
